A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolute shit. Crappiest Star Wars ever made.
Every character is a pathethic asshole with the mind of a lumbering retard.
Luke Skywalker has nothing to do with the character\, the brave and optimistic jedi master is turned into an old cunt with a shit backstory. And then he dies for no reason.
They kill off snoke with another pathethic death
Rey is still super strong\, even without any training. And apparently her parents were nobody.
Finn and rose go on a mission to sabotage the resistance and ruin the movie and unfortunately they dont die. They should not be alive after ruinning everything.
Leia surprisingly doesnt die\, they kill an purple haired woman who should not even exist instead.
Theres a bunch of annoying jokes all the time like if the movie was mocking me. And more cg than the prequels.
If i were to say every thing that is wrong with this movie i'd need something like a billion pages. Listen folks: DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY IN THIS RIDICULOUS PILE OF GARBAGE.
It shits on every thing star wars.
It made me angry
Im so fuckin angry
